byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

abstract: Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton's laborious preparations for first presidential debate contrast sharply with Donald J Trump's more carefree approach; hopes to goad her Republican rival, who prefers spontaneity and shuns mock debates, into lashing out.

keywords.value: Trump: The Art of the Deal (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton’s team is gathering insights into Mr. Trump’s personality to pinpoint weaknesses, but he prefers a freewheeling approach to avoid sounding “scripted or phony.”
snippet: Mrs. Clinton’s team is gathering insights into Mr. Trump’s personality to pinpoint weaknesses, but he prefers a freewheeling approach to avoid sounding “scripted or phony.”...

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Piles Up Research in Bid to Needle Donald Trump at First Debate
headline.print_headline: Clinton Piles Up Research in Bid to Needle Trump
